00536   struct DrawObjectAdjacencies : public DrawWithBoardModifier
00537   {
00538     DrawObjectAdjacencies( bool drawAdj = true )
00539         : myDrawAdj( drawAdj )
00540     {}
00541     void selfDraw( DGtalBoard & board ) const
00542     {
00543       board.myModes[ "Object" ] = myDrawAdj ? "DrawAdjacencies" : "";
